reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality elegant stationery
reviews.reviewText: I write for human rights. The letters are destined for Ambassadors and heads of state. Since I want my letters to be taken seriously, I use high quality, elegant stationery. This Crane’s stationary fit my needs perfectly. I am very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Paper for a Personal Touch
reviews.reviewText: It amazes me how much people appreciate a real, hand-written note, and this paper makes your notes look classy. I slide a piece of ruled paper underneath to keep my lines straight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cranes is at the top!
reviews.reviewText: Disappointed to learn Cranes had been bought by Hallmark, but if nothing changes, I guess I’m ok with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Toothy writing paper
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to write a condolence letter and I realized that my personalized stationery is too jaunty and colorful for such a purpose, so I ordered this, which arrived within two days.I'm a left-handed fountain pen user, which means I push the nib across the page. This paper has quite a bit of tooth, so it's not a smooth writing experience for me. That said, the ink doesn't feather or bleed. (I'm using Waterman Serenity Blue in a TWSBI Eco EF.) The paper is thick, and there is very little ghosting. If you hold the paper up to the light, you can see the watermark "Crane & Co 100% cotton". On the reverse side, there is no blue edging, but the word "Crane" is printed in blue in small letters at the bottom. This bit of branding is not obtrusive and doesn't bother me at all.I printed out some college-ruled paper, went over the lines with a dark pen, added vertical lines with a ruler every 2 cm, and taped it to my desk. With the Crane paper on top, I can see the rulings and this helps keep my writing straight and neat. Since I have a glass desk, I can shine a lamp underneath to make the lines even clearer, but it's not necessary to do so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars delivers an excellent product. I highly recommend this company
reviews.reviewText: Few people write letters anymore. But, for those of us who do, the writing material we use is very important because it conveys the respect we have for the recipient. In all aspects, Crane & Co. delivers an excellent product. I highly recommend this company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems like a lost art these days
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves to hand write letters too friend's and clients. Seems like a lost art these days. He loved this product. Simple but classy and good quality..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2015
reviews.reviewText: This Crane stationary does not disappoint in quality. It is stylish, sophisticated and makes me feel like I am sending my thoughts and wishes to others in a caring manner...........not just another email.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Used for a special letter to a special young lady. Excellent for writing with a fountain pen. No spreading/bleeding. Very nice.
